TopicTitle: If you were the first person on mars, what would you say?

Articles.Content:
"Hey remember that guy way back then who crashed here?"

"nah, that's just a myth"

"then, who's that?"

<screaming>

Hey, a new page!

Edited February 23, 2022 by SkyFall2489
Fancy a swim?
Hope it's not like last time!
Singing "Feels like the first time"

"can I come back inside now?"

"no"
(Tries to say something, but can't in the nearly vacuum. Just wheezes.)
"Hey, have you seen that movie "Total Recall?"

"OK, we made it. What's the next step?"

"OK, so we set up a base, run some experiments, and then..."

"wait, this doesn't say anything about a return trip..."

"oops."
Where is the Mars Bar factory?
Isn't it Duna?

Well, we missed by 20,000 lightyears. The Black Hole Explorer 1 has landed on Mars, though!

Wait, what's that big sha-

*smash*

ME: This is MY country! FEAR THE FLYING SPACE CARRIER!

...

"Why are we here again?"

"No one knows. We just are. Always have been always will be."

"What do you mean? We just landed here."

"No, there's some temporal anomaly thingamajig here, makin' time go in circles."

"Why are we here again?"

"No one knows. We just are. Always have been always will be."

"What do you mean? We just landed here."

"No, there's some temporal anomaly thingamajig here, makin' time go in circles."

"Why are we here again?"

"No one knows. We just are. Always have been always will be."

"What do you mean? We just landed here."

"No, there's some temporal anomaly thingamajig here, makin' time go in circles."

"Why are we here again?"

"No one knows. We just are. Always have been always will be."

"What do you mean? We just landed here."

"No, there's some temporal anomaly thingamajig here, makin' time go in circles."

"Why are we here again?"

"No one knows. We just are. Always have been always will be."

"What do you mean? We just landed here."

"No, there's some temporal anomaly thingamajig here, makin' time go in circles."

...
Just plays the opening theme from Space 2001

Ok. 

Here we go! 

I'm the first man who land on Mars! 

(stomp)

Oops. 

(landing legs broke)

Nooooooooooooo! 

Edited March 5, 2022 by Abel101126
I thought it would be bigger.

Your outdoor suit is dusty?

Your entire planet is also covered with dust?

The air outside is almost vacuum?

Can't even open your window to refresh it in your room?

Forget your problems!

Do you know about the Kirby's Best Vacuum Cleaner?

It is your best friend on the Moon, on the Mars, and even on the Earth!

Please, let me show it in action, and then decide if you prefer keep living without it, or change your life for the better! For the much better!
Where is Barsoom?
Bar? Soon.

"Hey, Bob?"

"What, Jeb?"

"I think we're in a computer game!"

*gunshots*

*PSIA agent enters the pod*

PSIA agent: "They must not know!"

Edited March 31, 2022 by Akagi
I'll count while you hide.
"Hey, look! New Page! Whose wallet?"
This doesn't look like Duna.
Ok, I have seen it. Can I go home now?
"Hey, kitty, kitty, kitty... OH, SH...  !!!"
I think my Uber over charged me.
